citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — several free apps and online tools can read text in natural-sounding voices. Most let you paste or upload text and hear it spoken, some with realistic AI voices. Voice.ai

sources.title: Forget Audible - ChatGPT can now read documents and even ebooks out loud to you (and it's surprisingly good)
sources.snippet:
The article from Tom’s Guide highlights a new feature in ChatGPT that allows it to read documents and ebooks aloud, offering a viable alternative to text-to-speech apps like Speechify and audiobook services like Audible. This Read Aloud feature is integrated into the free ChatGPT mobile app for both iPhone and Android users and does not require a ChatGPT Plus subscription. Users can upload a file or paste text into a chat, and ChatGPT reads it back using a natural, human-like voice. 

Compared to paid services, ChatGPT's Read Aloud is praised for being free, seamless, and context-aware, making it especially useful for productivity, writing, and on-the-go listening. Some noted downsides include the manual uploading of documents and occasional interruptions with prompts to continue reading. Regardless, users find it highly effective for most everyday needs and a compelling alternative to pricier or less intuitive solutions.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Free, Naturalistic Text-to-Speech Options ChatGPT / ChatGPT app (free) – Built-in Read Aloud can read documents or pasted text in natural human-like voices. Tom's Guide

sources.title: Speechify: Free Text Reader. Read text aloud for free
sources.snippet: Read any document, article, or webpage out loud with a Speechify’s text reader. Adjust speed, voice, and tone — perfect for multitasking.

sources.title: Speechify: Free Text to Speech with Humanlike AI Voices
sources.snippet: Experience free text to speech with Speechify’s AI voice generator, offering over 1,000 natural-sounding, realistic voices across 60+ languages. Simply convert text into speech, choose your favorite AI voice, and listen to any text read aloud or download your audio instantly.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Speechify (free tier) – Online and mobile app with many realistic AI voices (1000+ voices, 60+ languages). Speechify+1

sources.title: ElevenLabs' AI Reader app can now narrate text in 32 languages
sources.snippet: ElevenLabs has globally launched its AI Reader text-to-speech app, expanding support to 32 languages, including Spanish, French, Arabic, Mandarin, and Hindi. Initially released in June in the US, UK, and Canada, the app is now available worldwide on iOS and Android. It allows users to listen to various text formats such as PDFs, articles, newsletters, and ePub files, though it does not support Kindle or Apple Books. The app offers a wide range of AI-generated voices, including those of deceased celebrities like Judy Garland and James Dean, with licensed usage approved by their heirs. The Reader app is free to use and doesn’t consume credits from ElevenLabs' main subscription plan. A premium version is in development, but the company assures a generous free tier will remain.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Mobile / Platform-Specific ElevenLabs AI Reader app (free tier) – Mobile text reader with high-quality voices (supports many languages). The Verge
Real Voice Text to Speech (Android) – Android app with natural-sounding TTS. Google Play
